ygData.subject: Pickled Gator and Lizard  and jars
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I collected 20 or so gator meats from DW crocs and camains in S.RO, and picked up some lizard meat from various vendors. I finally get back to Neriak
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I collected 20 or so "gator meats" from DW crocs and camains in S.RO,
and picked up some lizard meat from various vendors. I finally get back to
Neriak with visions preparing some pickled gator to let soak for a little
while.. Put the gator meat and viniger in the oven, and BAM! Items do not
combine ! Same with lizard.

Tried adding water to the mix, no luck..

the recipe book says to use a jar, but have heard otherwise in the mailing
list, was wondering if they changed this with the new patch? I didn't get a
chance to actually make a jar to experiment, since Neriak doesn't have
sketches, and didn't feel like walking to east commons..

Any ideas? I got all this gator meat rotting in the bank, and don't want to
make steaks from it, since they are trivial.. Not sure if the pickled
stuff is or not, but sure sounds tasty.. :)
